entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
